attributes.action: Get Oakley the Op he needs!
attributes.additional_details: Oakley smith is three years old and has spastic dipelgia Cerebral Palsy. One of the symptom is that it causes painful tightness in his legs so he is un able too walk indepentedly we need your help too raise £58,000 to send Oakley to St Louis childrens hospital in Missouri to have a Selective Dorsal Rhizotomy(SDR) operation. He is a very determind young boy. He gets upset all of the time about not being able to walk like his brother and he says things like 'i just want too walk like Mykey'
